ModInfo.Name: 60/30 FPS Gameplay
ModInfo.Author: Vertex2995, Obesebear, Kaldarasha
ModInfo.Description:
This mod allows the game to run on a higher FPS than the original. It contains two possible modes: - Full 60 FPS: This bumps up the FPS to 60 for battle, field, and world mode. - Full 30 FPS: This bumps up the FPS to 30 for battle mode The mod contains 3D model interpolated animations (battle character models, battle enemy models, field character models, ...) except world character models (unnecessary), chocobo mode models, submarine mode models and highway mode models.
If you are playing FF7 without any gameplay mods, make sure to set the fix field script mode for 60 FPS in the mod settings.

ConfigOption.Name: FPS Mode
ConfigOption.Description: Select FPS Mode: - Full 60 FPS: This bumps up the FPS to 60 for battle, field, and world mode. - Full 30 FPS: This bumps up the FPS to 30 for only battle mode

ConfigOption.Name: Advanced Field Animation (60 FPS)
ConfigOption.Description:
Select the desired style of FIELD animations. This will not affect battle animations.
NOTE: This option affects the animations only if the FPS mode is set to "Full 60 FPS", otherwise this does not change anything

ConfigOption.Name: Field mode 60 FPS Fix
ConfigOption.Description:
This option will fix 60 FPS animation glitches on few FIELD maps script (Look at README for the number of maps). The fix happens only if you are using "Full 60 FPS" mode.
WARNING: This option is not compatible with mods that modifies the script such as Gameplay mods (e.g. Echo-S and New Threat) and other translation mods. Look at their mod config settings to see if they support it.
